flawed_nl_solution:
After buying 3 pieces of gum Ariana has 10 + 3 = <<10+3=31>>31 pieces of gum.
After giving her 11 friends gum Ariana has 31 - 11 = <<31-11=20>>20 pieces of gum left.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 31. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
